name: Vrock
movement: 40 ft. walking and flying speed of 60 ft.
description: A Vrock has the body of a vulture combined with humanoid features, sharp talons, and wings. Its head is sinister and bird-like.
memorable: The Vrock combines formidable melee attacks with crowd control through its toxic spores and stunning screech.
goals: To sow chaos and destruction, often leading demonic forces in battle.
relations: Commonly found alongside other demons as part of a demonic hierarchy.
environment: Typically found in locations of death and destruction, often where demonic forces gather.
strengths: Strong melee capabilities with poison immunity and resistance to cold, fire, and lightning damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and strategic spells that exploit its weaknesses.
attacks: Multiattack includes a beak strike and claw attacks, dealing significant slashing and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Stunning Screech can stun multiple targets, disrupting enemy actions.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 16, indicating strong awareness.
skills: Magic Resistance provides an advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
Ability to create a cloud of toxic spores as a battlefield control feature.
Engages in brutal melee combat, emphasizing its strength and ferocity.
Can operate stealthily despite its size, enhancing its surprise attack potential.
Often serves under more powerful demons, acting as a powerful enforcer.
